Package agents

Agents are asked to play a legal Action.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Agent The basic behavior of an Agent is : According to the current state of the environment, choose the action Apply this action, get the reward Every Agent can call its underlying algorithm, and ask it to choose the action.
Agent2Joueurs Adversarial agent must wait the answer of its opponent before learning (afterstates, Sutton & Barto page 156)
ElementaryAgent  
Swarm A Swarm is composed of several Agents, each one with its own Selectionneur.
 

Package agents Description

Agents are asked to play a legal Action.
They are informed of :

  • The environment (i.e. the game's rules)
  • The current state of the environment.
They can :
  • Create the list of possible moves.
  • Ask their underlying algorithm which move it prefers.
  • Obtain a reward for their move, and learn.
